file.name: Alpine3d-3.2.0-x86_64.tar.gz
file.description: Binary package: Alpine3D bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64 with OpenMP. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Alpine3d-3.2.0-x86_64.deb
file.description: Binary package: Alpine3D bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64 with OpenMP. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Alpine3d-3.2.0-x86_64.rpm
file.description: Binary package: Alpine3D bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64 with OpenMP. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Alpine3d-3.2.0-x86_64.dmg
file.description: OsX binary package: Alpine3D bundled with MeteoIO, compiled with XCode on Intel. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Alpine3d-3.2.0-x86_64.exe
file.description: Windows installer: Alpine3D bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64 with gcc8.1. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Alpine3d-3.2.0-src.tar.gz
file.description: Please have a look at Getting-started for instructions. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!
